lead_paragraph: Hours after President Obama presided over a memorial service, loved ones of three of the slain officers began saying goodbye.

byline.contributor: John Eligon reported from Dallas, and Patrick McGee from Plano, Tex.
byline.original: By JOHN ELIGON and PATRICK McGEE

headline.print_headline: Families, Friends and Fellow Officers  Honor the Dead in Dallas
headline.main: Families and Fellow Officers Honor Victims of Dallas Sniper

snippet: Hours after President Obama presided over a memorial service, loved ones of three of the slain officers began saying goodbye....
abstract: Families, friends and colleagues attend services honoring police officers killed during Dallas sniper attack.
